DOC.brief_summary: Massachusetts Healthy Families Evaluation randomize control trial statewide home visit program first time parent age 20 year . The evaluation use mixed-method design ass participant outcomes five program goal area : 1 ) prevention child abuse neglect ; 2 ) optimal child development ; 3 ) educational achievement economic self-sufficiency ; 4 ) parental well-being ; 5 ) prevention repeat teenaged birth .
DOC.criteria: age 16 21 year firsttime parent cognitive delay fluent either Spanish English
